commitResults.messageBody:
- Made Login and Logoff functions
- Included Echo function
- Exits with "bye"

- Added UserInput Class: To process and execute user input commands.
- Added TaskList Class: To store tasks and interact with the list.
- Added Task Classes: To establish properties of a task.
- Added the ability to store whatever text entered by the user and display them back to the user when requested.
- Added slow text printing for opening and closing.

- Added the ability to mark tasks as done.
- Added the ability to change the status back to not done.
- Added NumberConverter Class: provide ability to detect number words in the input
- Added proper documentation comments

- Added Event Class: tasks that start at a specific date/time and ends at a specific date/time.
- Added Deadline Class: tasks that need to be done before a specific date/time.
- Added ToDo Class: tasks without any date/time attached to it.
- Created tasktypes Package: Task, Deadline, Todo, Event.
- Created userinterface Package: UserInput, TaskList, NumberConverter.
- Revamped Task List Printing and Documentation.

- Set up the automated testing of text UIs using the input/output redirection technique.
- Updated runtest.bat to recognise emojis and skip Amadeus introduction during comparison.
- Created customised input tests to check all possible output variants.

- Added AmadeusException Class: Creates exceptions with custom error messages.
- Updated existing error messages to throw exceptions and catch them instead of printing.

- Reorganized the classes into suitable java packages.
- Added Peer Review Suggestions.

- Added support for deleting tasks from the list.
- Updated automatic testing to test delete function.
- Added method for user to see all possible Amadeus commands.

- Save the tasks in the hard disk automatically whenever the task list changes. Load the data from the hard disk when the chatbot starts up.
- Added ability to fully "reset" saved list.
- Updated unit tests to include saving/loading.
